ARABIC: تَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ بُرُوجًا وَجَعَلَ فِيهَا سِرَٰجًا وَقَمَرًا مُّنِيرًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Blessed be He who placed constellations in the sky and put a blazing lamp and shining moon among them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Blessed is He who placed in the heavens constellations of stars, and placed a burning lamp in it and the luminous moon.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Highly blessed is He, Who has made fortified spheres in the heavens and has set in it a "lamp" and a shining moon.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Blessed is He who has established constellations in the sky and made therein a lamp and a shining moon.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Most Auspicious is He Who created lofty towers in the sky and placed a lamp in it, and the luminous moon.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Blessed be He Who has placed in the heaven Al-Buruj, and has placed therein a great lamp, and a moon giving light.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Blessed is He Who made the constellations in the heavens and made therein a lamp and a shining moon.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Blessed be He who has set in heaven constellations, and has set among them a lamp, and an illuminating moon.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Blessed be He Who hath placed in the heaven mansions of the stars, and hath placed therein a great lamp and a moon giving light!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Exalted is He who put constellations in the heavens, a radiant lamp and an illuminating moon --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Blest be He Who hath placed big stars in the heaven, and hath placed therein a lamp and a moon enlightening.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Blessed is He who appointed houses in the sky and set in it a lamp and a shining moon.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Blessed is He Who made constellations in the skies, and placed therein a Lamp and a Moon giving light;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Blessed be He Who has placed in the heaven big stars, and has placed therein a great lamp (sun), and a moon giving light.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Blessed be He who has set the constellations in the heaven, and set amongst them a sun, and an illuminating moon.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Blessed is He who placed constellations in the sky, and placed in it a lamp, and an illuminating moon.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Blessed is He who has placed in the sky great stars and placed therein a [burning] lamp and luminous moon.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [25:61] God, exalted be He, says: Blessed, magnified, is He Who has placed in the heaven constellations, twelve [of them]: Aries, Taurus, Gemini, Cancer, Leo, Virgo (al-sunbula), Libra, Scorpio, Sagittarius, Capricorn, Aquarius and Pisces. They are the mansions for the seven orbiting planets: Mars rules Aries and Scorpio, Venus: Taurus and Libra, Mercury: Gemini and Virgo, the Moon: Cancer, the Sun: Leo, Jupiter: Sagittarius and Pisces, and Saturn: Capricorn and Aquarius; and has, also, placed in it a lamp, namely, the sun, and a shining moon (a variant reading [for sirājan, ‘sun’] has the plural surujan, which would mean ‘luminous stars’). The moon is singled out for mention because of its particular merit.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Blessed be He) He is the Possessor of grace He (Who hath placed in the heaven mansions of the stars) and it is said that this means: mansions, (and hath placed therein) in the heaven (a great lamp) the sun shining during the day for the children of Adam (and a moon giving light) to the Children of Adam during the night!
